content: adventurous beginner potato doodle cowl single-sided the potato doodle cowl this doodle chart expansion pack is a ridiculous version of an april fools joke for 2024 fangirl fibers yarnaceous fibers and i all decided to create a spoof-like doodle inspired by our favorite potatoes and now you get to knit them this is a doodle series pattern which means the micro charts are intended to be used as mix-and- match colorwork motifs throughout your project 10 doodle motifs included are russet potatoes sweet potatoes mashed potatoes baked potatoes french fries crinkle fries waffle fries potato chips hashbrowns and tater tots potato-inspired yarn kits available by fangirl fibers and yarnaceous fibers not sure where to start check out the ultimate guide for how to doodle with yarn for an helpful overview or download the free doodle workbook for an in depth walkthrough with worksheets tutorial links and resources ready to add more charts check out more chart-only expansion packs or
